articles.author: HT Tech
articles.title: Google is killing this popular podcast app in the US despite having 500 million downloads - HT Tech
articles.description: Google's Podcasts app, popular worldwide, is shutting down for U.S. users on April 2. Users need to migrate their data, but the process can be complex and pose security risks.
articles.content: Google's Podcasts app, boasting over 500 million downloads globally, is set to cease operations for users in the United States on April 2. Despite its large user base, only a small fraction of U.S. p… [+2407 chars]

articles.title: Linux could have been brought down by backdoor found in widely used utility - TechSpot
articles.description: Andres Freund, a PostgreSQL developer at Microsoft, was doing some routine micro-benchmarking when he noticed a small 600ms delay with ssh processes, noticing that these were using...
articles.content: Why it matters: By happenstance Microsoft researcher Andres Freund found malicious code that could break sshd authentication. If it hadn't been discovered it could have posed a grave threat to Linux.… [+4179 chars]
